body_html:
You are of course correct; here's a fixed version of the test: gchanan@c089cb5 which demonstrates the error.

I'll probably put an error message in the double backwards impl similar to how there is one for the transposed case so it's not surprising.

body:
You are of course correct; here's a fixed version of the test: https://github.com/gchanan/pytorch/commit/c089cb52c10b45c6543095e7788770f30dbd82e8 which demonstrates the error.

I'll probably put an error message in the double backwards impl similar to how there is one for the transposed case so it's not surprising.
